title: Onegai Patron-sama! (Dear My Patron)
synopsis: The story centers on hero pair teams named "Patraisers," consisting of "Sugars" and their supporter "Patrons." The Patraiser teams "reinvigorate people's frozen hearts."
characters: ['Nekoyashiki, Ryouya', 'Yuga, Asahi', 'DC', 'Tsugiki, Inari', 'Tsugiki, You', 'Kurumi, Mine', 'Higuma, Touto']
voices: ['Toyoshima, Masato', 'Imamura, Masaya', 'Yamada, Kazuma', 'Sakagami, Shou', 'Asagiri, Yuuhi', 'Maeuchi, Takafumi', 'Hoshino, Keigo']
